PreceptDef.label: dictated by stars
PreceptDef.description:
The endless sea of stars in our skies will dictate my future, be it benevolent or otherwise.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - After every Divine the Stars ritual, a solar eclipse or an aurora, mood will randomly change between -30 and +30.

thoughtStageDescriptions.li: Stars are not on my side

li.label: stars are aligned
li.description: The astral architects smile upon me, their benevolence is unmatched.

li.label: stars are perfect
li.description: The stellar bodies above tell a story of imminent fortunes and success.

li.label: stars are excellent
li.description: The stars whisper to me, and they tell me to breathe easy. My fate is comfortably in their hands.

li.label: stars are good
li.description: Though small, the constellations tell me all is well for the time being.

li.label: stars are indifferent
li.description: The stars whisper nonsense and contradictions, our destiny is increasingly unclear.

li.label: stars are bad
li.description: The skies do not bode well, an ill omen is on the horizon.

li.label: stars are not on my side
li.description: The sea of stars is ever cloudy, they shroud themselves from me and refuse to tell me of my fate.

li.label: stars are a bad omen
li.description: The stellar bodies far above have made themselves clear, I am no longer in their favor.

li.label: stars are aligned… against me
li.description: The planets have aligned, a syzygy has made clear my approaching demise is inescapable. I will shortly be reduced to mere dust.

PreceptDef.label: shared
PreceptDef.description:
Empathy is a quality we must all strive to possess. We bear each other's burdens as well as each other's jubilations.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - If the average colony mood is happy, colonists receive a positive thought, and vice versa.

li.label: rejoice
li.description: Everyone is in good mood, as am I.

li.label: grieve
li.description: Everyone is in bad mood, as am I.

PreceptDef.label: low spirits
PreceptDef.description: We are stranded on a lost, forgotten planet on the Rim. Things can hardly get worse.

li.label: bad mood
li.description: I'm just generally having a bad mood. The Rim is a hostile place.

PreceptDef.label: high spirits
PreceptDef.description: The whole world is ours to explore and enjoy.

li.label: good mood
li.description: I'm just generally having a good mood. The Rim is an amazing place.
